Tutorial: Regular Expressions in Open Refine =============================== __Data:__ http://data.riksdagen.se/Data/Ledamoter/ ###Step 1: Import data __Data:__ http://data.riksdagen.se/Data/Anforanden/ ![Xml export](images/xml_export.png) 
import re
return re.search("(Herr) talman", value).group(1)
